name: glpi
description: GLPI is a full-featured IT asset and service management platform that includes helpdesk, inventory, documentation, and automation tools. It is widely used in enterprise environments to manage IT assets and service requests.

features.title: Asset Management
features.description: Track hardware, software, and licenses across your entire IT infrastructure

features.title: Contract Management
features.description: Track vendor contracts, warranties, and maintenance agreements

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Plan and track IT projects with tasks, milestones, and resource allocation

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Generate reports on assets, tickets, and IT service metrics

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with hundreds of community and commercial plugins
